p: The aqueous extract obtained from the aerial parts of S. lavandulifolia is used in antipyretic, anti-inflammatory, spasmolytic, sedative, and hypnotic treatment [ 137]. Also, this plant has antibacterial, antioxidant, anxiolytic, analgesic, and wound-healing effects. Decoctions or infusions of Stachys are applied as tonics to treat skin or taken internally for stomach disorders [ 138].
